meanings.definition: A chemical compound used in skin lightening products.
meanings.sent1: The hydroquinones in the cream help to lighten dark spots on the skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new skincare product that contains hydroquinones to reduce pigmentation.
meanings.sent3: The hydroquinones in the lotion were like little helpers working to brighten her complexion.
meanings.sent4: The hydroquinones acted as magic erasers, fading away the blemishes on her face.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of hydroquinones in fading scars made her smile with satisfaction.
